verification.title: Account Verification
verification.firstParagraph:
Thank you for registering at TipTap! To fully utilize the service, we need to verify your email address.
We have sent a message to your email address:
verification.secondParagraph: Please click the link in the message to complete your registration and verify your account.
verification.resendButtonInfo: Didn't receive the message? Click the button below to resend it.
verification.verificationSuccess: Your account has been successfully verified. You can now log in.

forgotPassword.title: Reset Password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.successMessage: If an account with that email exists, a password reset link has been sent.

resetPassword.title: Set New Password
resetPassword.description: Please enter your new password below.
resetPassword.successMessage: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now log in with your new password.

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: This Privacy Policy sets out the rules for processing and protecting personal data of users using the TipTap service. The administrator of personal data is TipTap.

section2.title: 2. Data Collection
section2.content: We collect personal data that users voluntarily provide during registration and use of the service, such as first name, last name, email address, and other information necessary to provide services.

section3.title: 3. Purpose of Data Processing
section3.content: Personal data is processed for the purpose of providing services, user support, communication, and for statistical and analytical purposes.

section4.title: 4. User Rights
section4.content: The user has the right to access their data, correct it, delete it, restrict processing, transfer data, and object to data processing.

section5.title: 5. Security
section5.content: We apply appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure the protection of personal data against unauthorized access, loss, destruction, or alteration.

section6.title: 6. Cookies
section6.content: Our service uses cookies, which are small text files saved on the user's device when browsing websites. Cookies enable recognition of the user's device and appropriate display of the page tailored to their individual preferences.

section7.title: 7. Types of cookies
section7.content: We use cookies necessary for the service to function, analytical cookies for collecting information about how the service is used, and functional cookies that enable remembering user preferences. Our service may also use cookies from external providers, such as Google Analytics.

section8.title: 8. Cookie Management
section8.content: Users can change cookie settings in their web browser at any time. However, please note that disabling cookies may affect the functionality of the service and limit access to some features.

section1.title: 1. General Provisions
section1.content: These Terms of Service set out the rules for using the TipTap website available at www.tiptap.pl. Using the service means acceptance of these Terms of Service.

section2.title: 2. Definitions
section2.content: Service - the TipTap website available at www.tiptap.pl. User - a natural person, legal entity, or organizational unit without legal personality using the Service. Service Provider - TipTap being the administrator of the Service.

section3.title: 3. Registration and User Account
section3.content: To use the full functionality of the Service, the User must create an account by filling out the registration form. The User undertakes to provide true data. The User is responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of login data.

section4.title: 4. Rules for Using the Service
section4.content: The User undertakes to use the Service in a manner consistent with the law, good customs, and the provisions of these Terms of Service. It is prohibited to use the Service for purposes contrary to the law or violating the rights of third parties.

section5.title: 5. Copyright
section5.content: All content posted on the Service, including texts, graphics, logos, icons, are protected by copyright and are the property of the Service Provider or third parties that have granted a license for their use.

section6.title: 6. Liability
section6.content: The Service Provider is not responsible for content posted by Users on the Service. The Service Provider makes efforts to ensure the Service is available continuously, but does not guarantee uninterrupted operation of the Service.

section7.title: 7. Changes to Terms of Service
section7.content: The Service Provider reserves the right to make changes to the Terms of Service. Users will be informed of changes by displaying a message in the Service or sending an email.

home.quote: My first trainer used to say: "Love dance in yourself, not yourself in dance"
home.quoteDescription: I live by this motto to this day. That's why I created the Tip Tap school - a combination of my passion for music and dance, and many years of experience.
home.benefitsDescription: In Tip Tap classes, everyone has a chance to develop their musical and dance skills, overcome their weaknesses, and derive pleasure and joy from tap dancing.
home.joinFamily: Join our tap dancing family today!
